import React,{useState,useEffect,useContext} from 'react' import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import axios from 'axios' import Context from './Context' let array = [0,1,2,3] const MostPopular = ({popular}) => { console.log(popular,'prop') let image_url = 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/' let context = useContext(Context) let setResult = context.setresult let resultHandler = () =>{ setResult(popular) } return (

Most Popular

Discount on

Manga Light novels and all

{popular.map((item)=>{ console.log(item.image) return(

{item.name}

{item.price}

) })}
) } export default MostPopular
